duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist Premium Seats Sales Management Team in generating sales and administering all Live Nation Premium Seat Programs.
Prepare, issue, and verify return of all Premium Seat contracts as advised by Director of Premium Seats.
Oversee and maintain accounts receivable and assist in maintenance of client relationships.
Act as a liaison with internal departments and manage client requests for additional ticket purchases.
Assist with the processing of PSS sales reports and maintain client email database and facilitate regular email updates.
Coordinate on-site premium seat program responsibilities and client services for most concert events.
Interface with VIP Club catering staff to ensure a smooth running Club on event days.
Conduct cold calls, prospecting for new clients.
Perform other duties as assigned by management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
